verses.t: And{G2532} as he{G846} went out{G1607} of{G1537} the temple{G3588}, one{G1520} of his{G846} disciples{G3588} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Master{G1320}, see{G1492} what manner of{G4217} stones{G3037} and{G2532} what{G4217} buildings{G3619} are here!

And{G1161} Jesus{G2424} answering{G611}them{G846} began{G756} to say{G3004}, Take heed{G991} lest{G3361} any{G5100} man deceive{G4105} you{G5209}:

And{G1161} when{G3752} ye shall hear{G191} of wars{G4171} and{G2532} rumours{G189} of wars{G4171}, be ye{G1096} not{G3361} troubled{G2360}: for{G1063} such things must needs be{G1163}; but{G235} the end{G3588} shall not be yet{G3768}.

But{G1161} take heed{G991} to yourselves{G1438}: for{G1063} they shall deliver{G3860} you{G5209} up{G3860} to{G1519} councils{G4892}; and{G2532} in{G1519} the synagogues{G4864} ye shall be beaten{G1194}: and{G2532} ye shall be brought{G2476} before{G1909} rulers{G2232} and{G2532} kings{G935} for{G1752} my sake{G1700}, for{G1519} a testimony{G3142} against them{G846}.
And{G2532} the gospel{G3588} must{G1163} first{G4412} be published{G2784} among{G1519} all{G3956} nations{G3588}.

But{G1161} when{G3752} they shall lead{G71} you{G5209}, and deliver you up{G3860}, take{G4305} no{G3361} thought beforehand{G4305} what{G5101} ye shall speak{G2980}, neither{G3366} do ye premeditate{G3191}: but{G235} whatsoever{G3739} shall be given{G1325} you{G5213} in{G1722} that{G1565} hour{G3588}, that{G5124} speak ye{G2980}: for{G1063} it is{G2075} not{G3756} ye that{G5210} speak{G2980}, but{G235} the Holy{G40} Ghost{G3588}.

Now{G1161} the brother{G80} shall betray{G3860} the brother{G80} to{G1519} death{G2288}, and{G2532} the father{G3962} the son{G5043}; and{G2532} children{G5043} shall rise up{G1881} against{G1909} their parents{G1118}, and{G2532} shall cause{G2289} them{G846} to be put to death{G2289}.

And{G2532} ye shall be{G2071} hated{G3404} of{G5259} all{G3956} men for{G1223} my{G3450} name's sake{G3588}: but{G1161} he that{G3588} shall endure{G5278} unto{G1519} the end{G5056}, the same{G3778} shall be saved{G4982}.

But{G1161} when{G3752} ye shall see{G1492} the abomination{G3588} of desolation{G3588}, spoken of{G4483} by{G5259} Daniel{G1158} the prophet{G3588}, standing{G2476} where{G3699} it ought{G1163} not{G3756}, (let him that{G3588} readeth{G314} understand{G3539},) then{G5119} let them that be{G3588} in{G1722} Jud√¶a{G3588} flee{G5343} to{G1519} the mountains{G3588}:

And{G2532} let him{G3588} that is{G5607} in{G1519} the field{G3588} not{G3361} turn{G1994}back{G3694} again{G1519} for to take up{G142} his{G846} garment{G3588}.
But{G1161} woe{G3759} to them{G3588} that are{G2192} with{G1722} child{G1064}, and{G2532} to them{G3588} that give suck{G2337} in{G1722} those{G1565} days{G3588}!
And{G1161} pray ye{G4336} that{G2443} your{G5216} flight{G3588} be{G1096} not{G3361} in the winter{G5494}.

For{G1063} in those{G1565} days{G3588} shall be{G2071} affliction{G2347}, such as{G3634} was{G1096} not{G3756} from{G575} the beginning{G746} of the creation{G2937} which{G3739} God{G3588} created{G2936} unto{G2193} this time{G3568}, neither{G3361} shall be{G1096}.UNSURE: Of placment of "toioutos"

And{G2532} except{G1487} that the Lord{G2962} had shortened{G2856} those days{G3588}, no{G3756} flesh{G4561} should be saved{G4982}: but{G235} for{G1223} the elect's sake{G1588}, whom{G3739} he hath chosen{G1586}, he hath shortened{G2856} the days{G3588}.
And{G2532} then{G5119} if{G1437} any man{G5100} shall say{G2036} to you{G5213}, Lo{G2400}, here{G5602} is Christ{G3588}; or{G2228}, lo{G2400}, he is there{G1563}; believe{G4100} him not{G3361}:

For{G1063} false Christs{G5580} and{G2532} false prophets{G5578} shall rise{G1453}, and{G2532} shall shew{G1325} signs{G4592} and{G2532} wonders{G5059}, to{G4314} seduce{G635}, if{G1487} it were possible{G1415}, even{G2532} the elect{G1588}.
But{G1161} take{G991} ye{G5210} heed{G991}: behold{G2400}, I have foretold{G4280} you{G5213} all things{G3956}.

But{G235} in{G1722} those{G1565} days{G3588}, after{G3326} that{G1565} tribulation{G3588}, the sun{G3588} shall be darkened{G4654}, and{G2532} the moon{G3588} shall{G1325} not{G3756} give{G1325} her{G846} light{G3588},
And{G2532} the stars{G3588} of heaven{G3588} shall{G2071} fall{G1601}, and{G2532} the powers{G3588} that are{G3588} in{G1722} heaven{G3588} shall be shaken{G4531}.
And{G2532} then{G5119} shall they see{G3700} the Son{G3588} of man{G3588} coming{G2064} in{G1722} the clouds{G3507} with{G3326} great{G4183} power{G1411} and{G2532} glory{G1391}.

And{G2532} then{G5119} shall he send{G649} his{G846} angels{G3588}, and{G2532} shall gather together{G1996} his{G846} elect{G1588} from{G1537} the four{G5064} winds{G417}, from{G575} the uttermost part{G206} of the earth{G1093} to{G2193} the uttermost part{G206} of heaven{G3772}.

Now{G1161} learn{G3129} a parable{G3588} of{G575} the fig tree{G3588}; When{G3752} her{G846} branch{G3588} is{G1096} yet{G2235} tender{G527}, and{G2532} putteth forth{G1631} leaves{G3588}, ye know{G1097} that{G3754} summer{G3588} is{G2076} near{G1451}:
So{G3779} ye{G5210} in like manner{G2532}, when{G3752} ye shall see{G1492} these things{G5023} come to pass{G1096}, know{G1097} that{G3754} it is{G2076} nigh{G1451}, even at{G1909} the doors{G2374}.
Verily{G281} I say{G3004}unto you{G5213}, that{G3754} this{G3778} generation{G3588} shall{G3928} not{G3361} pass{G3928}, till{G3360} all{G3956} these things{G5023} be done{G1096}.

But{G1161} of{G4012} that{G1565} day{G3588} and{G2532} that hour{G3588} knoweth{G1492} no man{G3762}, no, not{G3761} the angels{G3588} which are{G3588} in{G1722} heaven{G3772}, neither{G3761} the Son{G3588}, but{G1487} the Father{G3588}.
Take ye heed{G991}, watch{G69} and{G2532} pray{G4336}: for{G1063} ye know{G1492} not{G3756} when{G4219} the time{G3588} is{G2076}.

For the Son of man is as{G5613} a man{G444} taking a far journey{G590}, who left{G863} his{G846} house{G3588}, and{G2532} gave{G1325} authority{G3588} to his{G846} servants{G3588}, and{G2532} to every man{G1538} his{G846} work{G3588}, and{G2532} commanded{G1781} the porter{G3588} to{G2443} watch{G1127}.

Watch ye{G1127} therefore{G3767}: for{G1063} ye know{G1492} not{G3756} when{G4219} the master{G3588} of the house{G3588} cometh{G2064}, at even{G3796}, or{G2228} at midnight{G3317}, or{G2228} at the cockcrowing{G219}, or{G2228} in the morning{G4404}:
